description:
Are You A Udemy Instructor Or A Prospective Udemy Instructor, And You Want To Build Your Email Marketing List Right Here On The Udemy Platform?

Maybe your sales have gone stale, or maybe you're afraid to launch your first course because you just don't have a big marketing budget?

Either Way, You Realize By Now That Email Marketing Is The Cornerstone To All Successful Businesses, Instructors, Teachers, Coaches, And Information Marketers.

That's why you're going to benefit tremendously from this course. Because as you know, email marketing is one of the best ways to sell anything.

The only problem, is that building a list on Udemy is a bit tricky. If you do it wrong, you might violate Udemy's terms of service, or worse yet, fall flat on your face without getting a single student to subscribe.

So, Would It Feel Good If You Could Turn Your Udemy Courses Into A Raging River Of Email Subscribers?

If that's the case, you're going to love this course. So you can build your list consistently and reliably using Udemy.

Maybe You Want To Build Your List On Udemy, But You Have No Idea What Type Of Lead Magnet To Offer?

If that's the case, you're about to brainstorm 7 different lead magnet ideas that are perfect for Udemy instructors.

Your students will be falling out of their chair to subscribe to your email list, because the lead magnet ideas taught in this course are awesome, and will provide extra value to your new and existing Udemy courses.

You'll Also Get To Spy On My Highly Converting Lead Capture Page

Maybe you want to build a lead capture page, but you have no idea what an ideal lead capture page looks like?

In this course you'll get to spy on the exact lead capture page I use to promote in my Udemy course that is currently converting at over 50%.

Enroll Now So You Can Finally Build Your List On Udemy!
title: Email List Building For Udemy Instructors
